inclusion.criterion: Patient will be asked to fill out the STAI questionnaire
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will complete the pre procedure questionnaire
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will be asked to fill out the Pain Catastrophizing Scale form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will be asked about their primary support person
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will be randomized to whether their companion will be allowed in the room or not
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will fill out the STAI questionnaire again after the completion of the neuraxial procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will record their perception of pain during the placement of the labor epidural catheter using a VAS
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient is receiving neuraxial anesthesia for a cesarean delivery
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a severe 'exploding' headache and was diagnosed with an AVM. She refused PT evaluation but was ambulating independently without difficulty.
